Cedar_Park.H-E-B Center:
The H-E-B Center is an indoor arena, located in Cedar Park, in the U.S. state of Texas, near Austin.
Originally named the Cedar Park Center, the arena is home to the Texas Stars of the American Hockey League, the Austin Spurs of the NBA G League and the Austin Acoustic of the Legends Football League.
The 8,700-seat sports arena is located at the corner of 183A and New Hope Road in Cedar Park, Texas.
